TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit ScrollBarRenderer extends System.Object
public ref class ScrollBarRenderer abstract sealed
.class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit ScrollBarRenderer extends System.Object

summary.span: 提供用于以视觉样式呈现滚动条控件的方法。

span.span: Provides methods used to render a scroll bar control with visual styles.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类提供一组 `static` 方法，这些方法可用于使用操作系统的当前视觉样式呈现滚动条控件。The class provides a set of `static` methods that can be used to render a scroll bar control with the current visual style of the operating system. 呈现控件是指绘制控件的用户界面。Rendering a control refers to drawing the user interface of a control. 如果要绘制的自定义控件应具有当前视觉样式的外观，此方法非常有用。This is useful if you are drawing a custom control that should have the appearance of the current visual style. 若要绘制滚动条，请使用此类中的方法的组合来呈现滚动条的每个部分。To draw a scroll bar, use a combination of the methods in this class to render each part of the scroll bar. 如果在操作系统中启用了视觉样式，并将视觉样式应用于应用程序窗口的工作区，则此类的方法将用当前视觉样式绘制滚动条。If visual styles are enabled in the operating system and visual styles are applied to the client area of application windows, the methods of this class will draw the scroll bar with the current visual style. 否则，此类的方法将引发 。Otherwise, the methods of this class will throw an . 若要确定是否可以使用此类的成员，可以检查属性的值 。To determine whether the members of this class can be used, you can check the value of the property. 此类包装 设置为类公开的元素之一的的功能 。This class wraps the functionality of a that is set to one of the elements exposed by the class. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [用视觉样式呈现控件](/dotnet/framework/winforms/controls/rendering-controls-with-visual-styles)。For more information, see [Rendering Controls with Visual Styles](/dotnet/framework/winforms/controls/rendering-controls-with-visual-styles). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建一个自定义控件，该控件使用 方法来绘制响应鼠标单击的滚动条。The following code example demonstrates how to create a custom control that uses the methods to draw a scroll bar that responds to mouse clicks. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBarRenderer#0](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBarRenderer/cpp/form1.cpp#0)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBarRenderer#0](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBarRenderer/CS/form1.cs#0)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBarRenderer#0](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBarRenderer/VB/form1.vb#0)]

param.name: g
param.span: 用于绘制滚动箭头的 。

span.span: The used to draw the scroll arrow.

param.name: bounds
param.span: 用于指定滚动箭头边界的 。

span.span: The that specifies the bounds of the scroll arrow.

param.name: state
param.span: 值之一，指定滚动箭头的可视状态。

span.span: One of the values that specifies the visual state of the scroll arrow.

summary.span: 使用视觉样式绘制滚动箭头。

span.span: Draws a scroll arrow with visual styles.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此方法之前，应验证 属性是否返回 `true` 。Before using this method, you should verify that the property returns `true`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用 自定义控件的方法中的方法在 由鼠标指针的位置确定的状态下绘制滚动箭头。The following code example uses the method in a custom control's method to draw a scroll arrow in the state determined by the location of the mouse pointer. 此代码示例是为类提供的更大示例的一部分 。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBarRenderer#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBarRenderer/cpp/form1.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBarRenderer#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBarRenderer/CS/form1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBarRenderer#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBarRenderer/VB/form1.vb#2)]

exception.span: 操作系统不支持视觉样式。

span.span: The operating system does not support visual styles.
-or-

exception.span: 用户在操作系统中禁用视觉样式。

span.span: Visual styles are disabled by the user in the operating system.
-or-

exception.span: 视觉样式不应用于应用程序窗口的工作区。

span.span: Visual styles are not applied to the client area of application windows.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此方法之前，应验证 属性是否返回 `true` 。Before using this method, you should verify that the property returns `true`.

exception.span: 操作系统不支持视觉样式。

span.span: The operating system does not support visual styles.
-or-

exception.span: 用户在操作系统中禁用视觉样式。

span.span: Visual styles are disabled by the user in the operating system.
-or-

exception.span: 视觉样式不应用于应用程序窗口的工作区。

span.span: Visual styles are not applied to the client area of application windows.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 大小调整句柄的大小取决于操作系统的当前视觉样式。The size of the sizing handle is determined by the current visual style of the operating system. 使用此方法之前，应验证 属性是否返回 `true` 。Before using this method, you should verify that the property returns `true`.

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示是否可使用 类以视觉样式绘制滚动条。

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether the class can be used to draw a scroll bar with visual styles.

value.span: 如果用户在操作系统中已经启用了视觉样式，并将视觉样式应用于应用程序窗口的工作区，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the user has enabled visual styles in the operating system and visual styles are applied to the client areas of application windows; otherwise, .
